verses.verse: Then <WG5119> shall the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> be likened<WG3666> unto<WG3933> ten<WG1176> virgins<WG3933>, who<WG3748> took<WG2983> their<WG846> lamps<WG2985>, and went<WG1831> forth<WG1519> to meet<WG529> the bridegroom<WG3566>.
And <WG1161> five<WG4002> of<WG1537> them<WG846> were<WG2258> foolish<WG3474>, and<WG2532> five<WG4002> were wise<WG5429>.
For <WG3748> the foolish<WG3474>, when they took<WG2983> their<WG1438> lamps<WG2985>, took<WG2983> no<WG3756> oil<WG1637> with<WG3326> them<WG1438>:
but <WG1161> the wise<WG5429> took<WG2983> oil<WG1637> in<WG1722> their<WG846> vessels<WG30> with<WG3326> their<WG846> lamps<WG2985>.
Now while<WG1161> the bridegroom<WG3566> tarried<WG5549>, they<WG3573> all<WG3956> slumbered<WG3573> and<WG2532> slept<WG2518>.
But <WG1161> at<WG3319> midnight<WG3571> there is a<WG1096> cry<WG2906>, Behold<WG2400>, the bridegroom<WG3566>! Come<WG2064> ye<WG1831> forth<WG1519> to meet<WG529> him<WG846>.
Then <WG5119> all<WG3956> those<WG1565> virgins<WG3933> arose<WG1453>, and<WG2532> trimmed<WG2885> their<WG846> lamps<WG2985>.
And <WG1161> the foolish<WG3474> said<WG2036> unto the wise<WG5429>, Give<WG1325> us<WG2254> of<WG1537> your<WG5216> oil<WG1637>; for<WG3754> our<WG2257> lamps<WG2985> are going out<WG4570>.

But <WG1161> the wise<WG5429> answered<WG611>, saying<WG3004>, Peradventure<WG3379> there will not<WG3756> be<WG714> enough<WG714> for us<WG2254> and<WG2532> you<WG5213>: go ye<WG4198> rather<WG3123> to<WG4314> them that sell<WG4453>, and<WG2532> buy<WG59> for yourselves<WG1438>.

And <WG1161> while<WG565> they<WG846> went<WG565> away to buy<WG59>, the bridegroom<WG3566> came<WG2064>; and<WG2532> they that were ready<WG2092> went in<WG1525> with<WG3326> him<WG846> to<WG1519> the marriage<WG1062> feast<WG2532>: and the door<WG2374> was shut<WG2808>.
Afterward <WG5305> came<WG2064> also<WG2532> the<WG3933> other<WG3062> virgins<WG3933>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, Lord<WG2962>, open<WG455> to us<WG2254>.
But <WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, I know<WG1492> you<WG5209> not<WG3756>.
Watch <WG1127> therefore<WG3767>, for<WG3754> ye know<WG1492> not<WG3756> the day<WG2250> nor<WG3761> the hour<WG5610>.

For <WG1063> it is as<WG5618> when a man<WG444>, going into another country<WG589>, called<WG2564> his own<WG2398> servants<WG1401>, and<WG2532> delivered<WG3860> unto them<WG846> his<WG846> goods<WG5224>.

And <WG2532> unto one<WG3739> he gave<WG1325> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>, to another<WG3739> two<WG1417>, to<WG1161> another<WG3739> one<WG1520>; to each<WG1538> according to<WG2596> his several<WG2398> ability<WG1411>; and<WG2532> he went<WG2112> on his journey<WG589>.

Straightway <WG1161> he that received<WG2983> the five<WG4002> talents<WG5007> went<WG4198> and<WG2532> traded<WG2038> with<WG1722> them<WG2532>, and made<WG4160> other<WG243> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>.
In <WG2532> like<WG5615> manner he<WG846> also<WG2532> that<WG3588> received the two<WG1417> gained<WG2770> other<WG243> two<WG1417>.
But <WG1161> he that received<WG2983> the one<WG1520> went<WG565> away and<WG2532> digged<WG3736> in<WG1722> the earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> hid<WG613> his<WG846> lord<WG2962>'s money<WG694>.

Now after<WG3326> a<WG5550> long<WG4183> time<WG5550> the lord<WG2962> of<WG1401> those<WG1565> servants<WG1401> cometh<WG2064>, and<WG2532> maketh a<WG3056> reckoning<WG4868> with<WG3326> them<WG846>.

And he that received<WG2983> the five<WG4002> talents<WG5007> came<WG4334> and brought<WG4374> other<WG243> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, thou deliveredst<WG3860> unto me<WG3427> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>: lo<WG1492>, I have gained<WG2770> other<WG243> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>.

His <WG846> lord<WG2962> said<WG5346> unto him<WG846>, Well done<WG2095>, good<WG18> and<WG2532> faithful<WG4103> servant<WG1401>: thou hast been<WG2258> faithful<WG4103> over<WG1909> a few things<WG3641>, I will set<WG2525> thee<WG4571> over<WG1909> many things<WG3641>; enter thou<WG1525> into<WG1519> the joy<WG5479> of<WG2962> thy<WG4675> lord<WG2962>.

And he<WG2983> also<WG2532> that received<WG2983> the two<WG1417> talents<WG5007> came<WG4334> and said<WG2036>, Lord<WG2962>, thou deliveredst<WG3860> unto me<WG3427> two<WG1417> talents<WG5007>: lo<WG1492>, I have gained<WG2770> other<WG243> two<WG1417> talents<WG5007>.

His <WG846> lord<WG2962> said<WG5346> unto him<WG846>, Well done<WG2095>, good<WG18> and<WG2532> faithful<WG4103> servant<WG1401>: thou hast been<WG2258> faithful<WG4103> over<WG1909> a few things<WG3641>, I will set<WG2525> thee<WG4571> over<WG1909> many things<WG4183>; enter thou<WG1525> into<WG1519> the joy<WG5479> of<WG2962> thy<WG4675> lord<WG2962>.

And <WG1161> he also<WG2532> that had received<WG2983> the<WG5007> one<WG1520> talent<WG5007> came<WG4334> and said<WG2036>, Lord<WG2962>, I knew<WG1097> thee<WG4571> that<WG3754> thou art<WG1488> a hard<WG4642> man<WG444>, reaping<WG2325> where<WG3699> thou didst<WG4687> not<WG3756> sow<WG4687>, and<WG2532> gathering<WG4863> where<WG3606> thou didst<WG1287> not<WG3756> scatter<WG1287>;
and <WG2532> I was afraid<WG5399>, and went<WG565> away and hid<WG2928> thy<WG4675> talent<WG5007> in<WG1722> the earth<WG1093>: lo<WG1492>, thou hast<WG2192> thine own<WG4674>.

But his<WG846> lord<WG2962> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Thou wicked<WG4190> and<WG2532> slothful<WG3636> servant<WG1401>, thou knewest<WG1492> that<WG3754> I reap<WG2325> where<WG3699> I sowed<WG4687> not<WG3756>, and<WG2532> gather<WG4863> where<WG3606> I did<WG1287> not<WG3756> scatter<WG1287>;

thou <WG4571> oughtest<WG1163> therefore<WG3767> to have put<WG906> my<WG3450> money<WG694> to the bankers<WG5133>, and<WG2532> at my coming<WG2064> I<WG1473> should have received<WG2865> back<WG302> mine own<WG1699> with<WG4862> interest<WG5110>.
Take <WG142> ye away therefore<WG3767> the talent<WG5007> from<WG575> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> give<WG1325> it unto him that hath<WG2192> the ten<WG1176> talents<WG5007>.

For <WG1063> unto<WG2192> every<WG3956> one that hath<WG2192> shall be given<WG1325>, and<WG2532> he shall have abundance<WG4052>: but<WG1161> from<WG575> him<WG846> that hath<WG2192> not<WG3361>, even<WG2532> that which<WG3739> he hath<WG2192> shall be taken<WG142> away<WG575>.

And <WG2532> cast ye<WG1544> out the unprofitable<WG888> servant<WG1401> into<WG1519> the outer<WG1857> darkness<WG4655>: there<WG1563> shall be<WG2071> the weeping<WG2805> and<WG2532> the gnashing<WG1030> of teeth<WG3599>.

But when<WG3752> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> shall come<WG2064> in<WG1722> his<WG846> glory<WG1391>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG32> angels<WG32> with<WG3326> him<WG846>, then<WG5119> shall he sit<WG2523> on<WG1909> the throne<WG2362> of<WG1391> his<WG846> glory<WG1391>:

and <WG2532> before<WG1715> him<WG846> shall be gathered<WG4863> all<WG3956> the nations<WG1484>: and<WG2532> he shall separate<WG873> them<WG846> one<WG240> from<WG575> another<WG240>, as<WG5618> the shepherd<WG4166> separateth<WG873> the sheep<WG4263> from<WG575> the goats<WG2056>;
and <WG2532> he shall set<WG2476> the sheep<WG4263> on<WG1537> his<WG846> right hand<WG1188>, but<WG1161> the goats<WG2055> on<WG1537> the left<WG2176>.

Then <WG5119> shall<WG2046> the King<WG935> say<WG2046> unto them<WG3588> on<WG1537> his<WG846> right hand<WG1188>, Come<WG1205>, ye blessed<WG2127> of<WG3962> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962>, inherit<WG2816> the kingdom<WG932> prepared<WG2090> for you<WG5213> from<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world<WG2889>:

for <WG1063> I was hungry<WG3983>, and<WG2532> ye gave<WG1325> me<WG3427> to eat<WG5315>; I was thirsty<WG1372>, and<WG2532> ye gave<WG4222> me<WG3165> drink<WG4222>; I was<WG2252> a stranger<WG3581>, and<WG2532> ye took<WG4863> me<WG3165> in<WG4863>;

naked <WG1131>, and<WG2532> ye clothed<WG4016> me<WG3165>; I was sick<WG770>, and<WG2532> ye visited<WG1980> me<WG3165>; I was<WG2252> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>, and<WG2532> ye came<WG2064> unto<WG4314> me<WG3165>.

Then <WG5119> shall<WG611> the righteous<WG1342> answer<WG611> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, when<WG4219> saw we<WG1492> thee<WG4571> hungry<WG3983>, and<WG2532> fed<WG5142> thee<WG2228>? or athirst<WG1372>, and<WG2532> gave thee drink<WG4222>?
And when<WG4219> saw we<WG1492> thee<WG4571> a stranger<WG3581>, and<WG2532> took thee in<WG4863>? or<WG2228> naked<WG1131>, and<WG2532> clothed thee<WG4016>?
And <WG1161> when<WG4219> saw we<WG1492> thee<WG4571> sick<WG772>, or<WG2228> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>, and<WG2532> came<WG2064> unto<WG4314> thee<WG4571>?

And <WG2532> the King<WG935> shall answer<WG611> and say<WG2046> unto them<WG846>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, Inasmuch<WG1909> as<WG3745> ye did<WG4160> it unto<WG80> one<WG1520> of these my<WG3450> brethren<WG80>, even these<WG5130> least<WG1646>, ye did<WG4160> it unto me<WG1698>.

Then <WG5119> shall he say<WG2046> also<WG2532> unto them<WG3588> on<WG1537> the left hand<WG2176>, Depart<WG4198> from<WG575> me<WG1700>, ye cursed<WG2672>, into<WG1519> the eternal<WG166> fire<WG4442> which is prepared<WG2090> for the devil<WG1228> and<WG2532> his<WG846> angels<WG32>:
for <WG1063> I was hungry<WG3983>, and<WG2532> ye did not<WG3756> give<WG1325> me<WG3427> to eat<WG5315>; I was thirsty<WG1372>, and<WG2532> ye gave<WG4222> me<WG3165> no<WG3756> drink<WG4222>;

I was<WG2252> a stranger<WG3581>, and<WG2532> ye took<WG4863> me<WG3165> not<WG3756> in<WG4863>; naked<WG1131>, and<WG2532> ye clothed<WG4016> me<WG3165> not<WG3756>; sick<WG772>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>, and<WG2532> ye visited<WG1980> me<WG3165> not<WG3756>.

Then <WG5119> shall<WG611> they<WG846> also<WG2532> answer<WG611>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, when<WG4219> saw we<WG1492> thee<WG4571> hungry<WG3983>, or<WG2228> athirst<WG1372>, or<WG2228> a stranger<WG3581>, or<WG2228> naked<WG1131>, or<WG2228> sick<WG772>, or<WG2228> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>, and<WG2532> did<WG1247> not<WG3756> minister<WG1247> unto thee<WG4671>?

Then <WG5119> shall he answer<WG611> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, Inasmuch<WG1909> as<WG3745> ye did<WG4160> it not<WG3756> unto one<WG1520> of these<WG5130> least<WG1646>, ye did<WG4160> it not<WG3761> unto me<WG1698>.
And <WG2532> these<WG3778> shall go away<WG565> into<WG1519> eternal<WG166> punishment<WG2851>: but<WG1161> the righteous<WG1342> into<WG1519> eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>.
